\usepackage{pdfpages}

\usepackage[%
  pdfauthor={$AUTHOR},%
  pdftitle={$TITLE},%
  pdfsubject={$SUBJECT},%
  pdfkeywords={$KEYWORDS},%
  bookmarks=false,%
  bookmarksopen=false,%
  pdfstartview=FitH,%
  pdfpagemode=UseOutlines,%
]{hyperref}

\pagestyle{empty}
